name: Luci RPG: The Quest for Pussy
storyline: While streaming and playing his favorite video games on stream, LuciDin notices that he runs completely dry of Diet Coke!
summary: Luci RPG - The Quest for Pussy is an adventure game in which LuciDin must journey to find some more, encountering strange characters, funny memes and gags, and a suspicious lil' cat who watches his every move!
